ActJudges Act
SubjectCécile Forgues** ANNUITY ** The Hon. André Gervais **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to CÉCILE FORGUES, survivor of the Hon. André Gervais, a Judge of the Superior Court of Québec, effective March 18, 2015.
